x10.matrix.comm

Class MatrixRemoteCopy

  • x10.lang.Object
    • x10.matrix.comm.MatrixRemoteCopy
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MatrixBcast, MatrixGather, MatrixReduce, MatrixRingCast, MatrixScatter

    public class MatrixRemoteCopy
extends x10.lang.Object
    This class transfers matrix data across different places. Matrix data is defined by DenseBlock, SparseBlock or DenseMatrix on DistArray.

    Two implementations are available, based on MPI routines and X10 remote array copy. To enable MPI communication, add "-define MPI_COMMU -cxx-prearg -DMPI_COMMU" in x10c++ build command, when you include commu package in your application source code, or link to the proper GML library (native_mpi version).

    For more information on how to build different backends and runtime, run command "make help" at the root directory of GML library.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MatrixRemoteCopy()

        mpiCopy
        

        protected static x10.lang.Int mpiCopy(DenseMatrix srcden,
                   x10.lang.Int srcColOff,
                   x10.array.DistArray<DenseMatrix> dmlist,
                   x10.lang.Int dstpid,
                   x10.lang.Int dstColOff,
                   x10.lang.Int colCnt)
        

        Declaration: mpiCopy(srcden:x10.matrix.DenseMatrix,srcColOff:x10.lang.Int,dmlist:x10.array.DistArray[x10.matrix.DenseMatrix]{self.dist.region.rank==1},dstpid:x10.lang.Int,dstColOff:x10.lang.Int,colCnt:x10.lang.Int): x10.lang.Int.
        Using MPI routine to copy multiple columns from source dense matrix at here
to the remote dense matrix of duplicated dense matrix at the specified place.
MPI send and recv are performed at here and the remote place respectively.
        

        Parameters:
        srcden - Input. The source dense matrix at here
        dmlist - Output. The duplicated dense matrix DistArray
        dstpid - Input. The place id of target dense matrix in the duplicated dense matrix.
        coloff - Input. Column offset in source matrix
        colcnt - Input. Count of columns to be copied from source dense matrix
        

        Returns:
        -- Number of elements copied.

        x10$matrix$comm$MatrixRemoteCopy$$x10$matrix$comm$MatrixRemoteCopy$this
        

        public final MatrixRemoteCopy x10$matrix$comm$MatrixRemoteCopy$$x10$matrix$comm$MatrixRemoteCopy$this()
        

        Declaration: x10$matrix$comm$MatrixRemoteCopy$$x10$matrix$comm$MatrixRemoteCopy$this(): x10.matrix.comm.MatrixRemoteCopy{self==this(:x10.matrix.comm.MatrixRemoteCopy)}.
        This class transfers matrix data across different places.
Matrix data is defined by DenseBlock, SparseBlock or DenseMatrix on DistArray.


         Two implementations are available, based on MPI routines and X10 remote array copy.
To enable MPI communication, add "-define MPI_COMMU -cxx-prearg -DMPI_COMMU"
in x10c++ build command, when you include commu package in your application source
code, or link to the proper GML library (native_mpi version).


        For more information on how to build different backends and runtime,
run command "make help" at the root directory of GML library.
